testcase.classname: US012 An Employee can manage Customer
testcase.name: TC003_There should be an Edit button where all customer information can be populated
testcase.system-out: Given Employee at the homepage "gmibank_url"................................passed And clicks the human icon at the right top..................................passed And chooses sign in option..................................................passed And gives "username_employee" to username textbox...........................passed And gives "password_employee" to password textbox...........................passed And clicks the sign in button...............................................passed And employee sign in successfully...........................................passed And clicks the my operations area...........................................passed And chooses manage customer option..........................................passed Then kullanici ekranda edit butonlarindan birini gorur......................passed
